text: The Mail & Guardian 200 Young South Africans is a list of individuals the Mail & Guardian considers to be the most influential 200 Young South Africans for the year. It was first published in 2006 by then editor-in-chief Ferial Haffajee, and only South Africans under the age of 35 are eligible. The first edition featured 100 notable South Africans under the age of 35. ==Notable recipients== *Bryan Habana (2007) *Lauren Beukes (2009) *Trevor Noah (2010) *Julius Malema (2010) ==References== ==External links== * Category:2006 establishments in South Africa Category:South African news websites Category:Weekly newspapers published in South Africa Category:Mass media in Johannesburg
title: Mail & Guardian 200 Young South Africans
